name: evolutionarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to evolution (= the way in which living things develop over millions of years): This claim was controversial because it seemed evolutionarily impossible. It is possible that these evolutionarily distant species share some characteristics.
in a way that involves a gradual process of change and development: Languages tend to develop evolutionarily.
More examplesFewer examplesEvolutionarily, these animals have remained fairly unchanged for millions of years.Children are evolutionarily programmed to learn.Evolutionarily speaking, the human brain hasn't stopped growing.
